metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4949 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An attacker with local access to a system (either through a disk or external drive) can present a modified XFS partition to grub-legacy in such a way to exploit a memory corruption in grubâ€™s XFS file system implementation.

criterions.comment: grub: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
